tasks.task_description: Check frontend admin dashboard code for partner applications display logic
Test API Gateway endpoints directly to verify response format
Examine frontend API service calls and error handling
Test admin dashboard in browser to identify specific failure point
Fix identified issue and verify resolution

description: Fix admin dashboard empty partner applications issue - comprehensive investigation and resolution
context: Found the issue! API Gateway is returning empty applications array despite Lambda logs showing 7-8 pending applications. The admin endpoint is working but returning empty results. Need to check Lambda function code for admin applications endpoint.

ISSUE IDENTIFIED: Admin function is using wrong DynamoDB table name. Admin function uses 'MP-1759859484941-DataStackPartnerApplicationTable548221AF-18TWY57Q2Z5ZR' (empty) but applications are in 'MP-1759859484941-DataStackPartnerApplicationTable548221AF-1XYHN9D5GAA2F' (has 11 items with 7 pending). Need to update admin function environment variable.

SUCCESS! Fixed the issue completely. Admin API endpoint now returns 7 pending partner applications correctly. The issue was: 1) Admin Lambda function environment variable pointing to wrong DynamoDB table name, 2) IAM role missing permissions for the correct table. Both issues resolved and API working perfectly.
